title: Life & Times of Baby Lucas: "I'm Alive"
description: In his mother’s wombThe Life and Times of Baby LucasIn his mother’s armsBetween members of the family and friendsAt times, the baby gets nervous and confused because of what’s happening around him. He doesn’t feel so safe when his mother goes away and he’s not really happy with his new friends.While reading this story, you will be taken by it! Because every single word is true, it’s what everyone of us felt when we were kids. We were afraid and anxious about small details. That’s our nature. We were born weak, scared, and wanting our parents’ attention after everything; trusting them more than anybody else. Let’s find out more about The Life and Times of Baby Lucas!
author: James Lynch Jr.
